info.title: Seren Cloud
info.description: Deploy and operate hosted skills through seren-cloud.

get.summary: List all deployments for the authenticated organization.
Get details of a specific deployment.

delete.summary: Delete a deployment and clean up compute resources.

patch.summary: Update config and/or secrets without redeploying code.

get.summary: List run events (history) for a deployment.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Repeat or comma-separate statuses: queued, running, completed, failed, cancelled, timeout, blocked, error

parameters.name: compute_backend
parameters.description: Filter by compute backend (aws_container, cloudflare_worker, daytona)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by run source (api, cli, scheduler, ui, system, unknown)

parameters.name: started_after
parameters.description: Filter runs started at/after RFC3339 timestamp

parameters.name: started_before
parameters.description: Filter runs started at/before RFC3339 timestamp

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Case-insensitive search across execution_id, status, source, run_name, output, metadata

post.summary: Run a one-shot invocation of a deployment.

get.summary: Get a single run event for a deployment.
List artifacts emitted by a specific deployment run.
Stream updates for a deployment run as Server-Sent Events.

post.summary: Start an always-on deployment (scale to 1 replica).
Stop an always-on deployment (scale to 0 replicas).
Create a reusable execution environment profile.

get.summary: Get a reusable execution environment profile.

delete.summary: Delete a reusable execution environment profile.

patch.summary: Update a reusable execution environment profile.

get.summary: List all runs across all deployments for the organization.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Repeat or comma-separate statuses: queued, running, completed, failed, cancelled, timeout, blocked, error

parameters.name: compute_backend
parameters.description: Filter by compute backend (aws_container, cloudflare_worker, daytona)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by run source (api, cli, scheduler, ui, system, unknown)

parameters.name: started_after
parameters.description: Filter runs started at/after RFC3339 timestamp

parameters.name: started_before
parameters.description: Filter runs started at/before RFC3339 timestamp

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Case-insensitive search across execution_id, status, source, run_name, output, metadata

get.summary: Get a single run event by ID (cross-agent).
List artifacts emitted by a run event.

post.summary: Cancel a queued/running run by ID.

get.summary: Stream updates for a run as Server-Sent Events.

CloudDeploymentEnvironment.description: Reusable execution environment profile for cloud deployments.

CloudDeploymentRunArtifact.description: Artifact emitted by a cloud run (for example PR links, plans, screenshots).

CloudDeploymentRunEvent.description: A single execution run event for a cloud deployment.

output.description: Raw stdout/stderr output. Universal fallback for all backend types.

output_events.description:
Structured event trace for agentic executions (thinking, tool calls, text).
Null for non-agentic scripts that produce plain stdout/stderr.

CloudDeploymentSummary.description: Summary view for listing deployments (excludes large fields like code_bundle).

CreateCloudDeploymentEnvironmentRequest.description: Request body for creating a reusable execution environment.

data.description: Reusable execution environment profile for cloud deployments.
A single execution run event for a cloud deployment.

output.description: Raw stdout/stderr output. Universal fallback for all backend types.

output_events.description:
Structured event trace for agentic executions (thinking, tool calls, text).
Null for non-agentic scripts that produce plain stdout/stderr.

data.description: Summary view for listing deployments (excludes large fields like code_bundle).

items.description: Reusable execution environment profile for cloud deployments.
Artifact emitted by a cloud run (for example PR links, plans, screenshots).
A single execution run event for a cloud deployment.

output.description: Raw stdout/stderr output. Universal fallback for all backend types.

output_events.description:
Structured event trace for agentic executions (thinking, tool calls, text).
Null for non-agentic scripts that produce plain stdout/stderr.

items.description: Summary view for listing deployments (excludes large fields like code_bundle).

DeployRequest.description: JSON body for the deploy endpoint (base64-encoded code bundle).

code_bundle_base64.description: Base64-encoded tar.gz of the scripts/ directory.

config.description: JSON config object (will be encrypted at rest).

secrets.description: JSON secrets object (key-value pairs, will be encrypted at rest).

system_prompt.description: System prompt for LLM orchestration (required when orchestration_mode = "llm").

tool_definitions.description: Tool definitions for the LLM to call.

OrchestrationMode.description:
Cloud deployment orchestration mode.

`Script` (default): container runs user code directly (existing behavior).
`Llm`: container runs the seren-orchestrator LLM tool-calling loop.

count.description: Number of items in this response

has_more.description: Whether there are more items after this page

total.description: Total number of items across all pages

UpdateCloudDeploymentEnvironmentRequest.description: Request body for updating a reusable execution environment.

UpdateCloudDeploymentRequest.description: Request body for updating config/secrets without redeploying.
